description: Bondi Beach attack has sparked more active policing in Sydney, Australia's most populous city and ​the state capital

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection Day 29: Ranveer Singh starrer crosses Rs 1160 crore mark worldwide
description: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' continues its reign at the box office, crossing Rs 1160 crore worldwide in its 5th week. The action-packed spy thriller has outperformed all regional, national, and international releases since its debut, demonstrating remarkable staying power and consistent audience engagement.

title: 40 years ago, January 3, 1986: Top-grade US arms for Pak
TN shocker: Man, live-in partner charred to death as group locks hut, sets it on fire
description: A 53-year-old man and his live-in partner were found charred to death in their hut in Tiruvannamalai district after it was allegedly set on fire by unidentified individuals. Police are investigating the suspicious deaths, considering potential involvement of the victims' estranged spouses. The couple had been living together for three years.

title: Aircraft overshoots runway in eastern Nepal; all aboard safe
description: The airplane overshot the runway by some 200 metres off the ground near a rivulet, suffering minor damage during the incident

title: Morning Digest: Centre orders X to check misuse of Grok chatbot; MP CM suspends two officials over Indore water contamination, and more
description: Here is a select list of stories to start the day.

title: Karnataka may scrap G-RAM-G, mulls own rural jobs scheme
description: Karnataka's cabinet has strongly opposed the Centre's new rural employment scheme, G-RAM-G, deeming it a blow to federalism and the right to work. The state is exploring its own rural employment guarantee program, potentially foregoing central funding to protect jobs and local development. This move comes as the new scheme shifts funding responsibilities to states.

title: Why these strength training routines do more than just build muscles
Iran's protests: What we know
description: The protests began in Tehran, where some shopkeepers went on strike over high prices and economic stagnation

title: 5 simple and healthy tiffin ideas for Monday to Friday
Libra Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: You may judge your partner on certain issues and state your opinion bluntly
Sagittarius Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: The more you use your contacts, the more you gain, says Ganesha
Scorpio Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: You may feel dissatisfied with your financial standing today
Capricorn Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: Differences in views or lifestyle may surface with your partner
Aquarius Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: Tension could make you pick a fight with your partner, Ganesha warns
Pisces Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: You may propose a romantic idea and your partner will happily execute it
Taurus Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: Planetary alignment boosts your voice and confidence

Virgo Horoscope Today, 03 January 2026: All is not smooth on the love front, says Ganesha
The Aravalli hills are shaken with the sound of machinery
description: A 2-billion-year-old range has been battered and bruised by mining, waste dumping, and encroachment, say environmentalists and those who live in its shadow. The Supreme Court order accepting the changed definition of the Aravalli hills caused further worry, though it has since been stayed. Ishita Mishra reports on the people living in the foothills, who believe that decisions about the Aravallis should involve and benefit communities

title: Exports hurt: States flag facility and testing gaps at Board of Trade meeting
7 of world’s rarest frogs presumed dead, study blames rise in photo tourism
Behind Indore deaths, civic collapse, health system struggling with deluge of patients
Commissioner of Metro Railway Safety inspects Phase II trains
description: The train services on the 15.8-km stretch from Poonamalle bypass to Vadapalani will start in February; the final inspection before commencing services is expected to be held in the last week of this month

title: Madras HC raps Tamil Nadu over ‘mechanical’ use of preventive detention law
Mukesh Singh new DGP of Ladakh, incumbent shifted to Arunachal
BJP leads with 44 candidates winning unopposed; Mahayuti wrests 68 out of 69 seats
After Rs 3 crore extortion call, 2 dozen shots fired at businessman's car; victim escapes unhurt
description: A businessman's car and home in Rohini were targeted with over two dozen gunshots in a brazen extortion attempt.  The attack, demanding Rs 3 crore, suggests the return of gangster Himanshu Bhau, believed to be in the US.  Police are investigating the incident, which involved extensive gunfire and threats received via WhatsApp.

title: Delhi Confidential: Party Time
Signature campaign in Kolkata to protect tamarind tree planted by revolutionary 70 years ago
description: A movement to save the tree was started in July 2024 after builders took over the property where the freedom fighter lived and when it seemed the tree would be taken down anytime

title: Nalagarh blast: Two groups claim responsibility; Himachal police scans CCTV footage to nab accused
description: Teams have been constituted to scan CCTV footage, and the police are coordinating with the Punjab Police and the National Investigation Agency (NIA) for the probe

title: Dhurandhar  re-released after muting words like ‘Baloch’
Grok says safeguard lapses led to images of 'minors in minimal clothing' on X
description: In a separate reply to a user on X on Thursday, Grok said most cases ‌could be prevented through advanced filters and monitoring although ‌it said “no system is 100% foolproof”

title: 35% of issues in big projects due to land acquisition; no plan to change law: Cabinet Secretary Somanathan
Yemen separatists launch two-year independence transition as strikes kill 20
description: Yemen, which was divided into North and South from 1967 to 1990, could again be split in two years if the STC’s independence plan comes to fruition

title: ED arrests Gujarat IAS officer in PMLA case
Amit Shah reviews Manipur situation with Governor, officials
Scrutiny turns to safety set-up of Swiss bar after deadly blaze
description: Police arrived quickly at the scene ​according to local residents, but the fire ⁠burned victims so severely that investigators said they would need days to identify the bodies

title: Andal shows us the way
Major boost: Govt clears 22 electronics parts projects at Rs 42,000 crore investment
description: India's electronics manufacturing sector receives a significant boost with 22 new component manufacturing proposals approved, attracting nearly Rs 42,000 crore in investments. Major players like Samsung, Foxconn, and Tata Electronics are set to enhance domestic production, aiming to reduce import reliance and bolster the nation's position as a global manufacturing hub.

title: ‘Won’t tolerate interference in internal matter’:  BJP slams Mamdani’s note to Umar Khalid
Russian strike on Ukraine's Kharkiv injures 25, Moscow denies attack took place
description: Russia’s ‌Defence Ministry, writing on Telegram, said reports of an attack were untrue and suggested the ‍blast at the site had been caused by the detonation of Ukrainian ammunition

title: Gill returns to domestic cricket; but you can’t watch him: Here's why
description: Shubman Gill’s Vijay Hazare Trophy match for Punjab against Sikkim will be played behind closed doors, similar to recent games involving Virat Kohli. As per BCCI guidelines, no spectators or live broadcast will be allowed due to security concerns and lack of seating at the Jaipuria College ground. Gill and Arshdeep Singh will also play Punjab’s next match against Goa on January 6.

title: Russia scores highest Ukraine gains since first year of war
description: The Russian army captured more than 5,600 square kilometres (2,160 square miles), or nearly one percent, of Ukrainian territory in 2025

title: Success stories under Mission Vihaan | Cricket, classes & exams: Inside Bihar’s Sasaram jail, quiet reforms
LoP Suvendu Adhikari calls West Bengal a ‘Bengali Hindu homeland’
description: The Bharatiya Janata Party MLA said that once the saffron party will provide 200 days of rural work, countering Trinamool’s claim that it will provide 100 days on employment under Karmashree Prakalpa

title: Grandmother, grandson burn to death in Gaza tent while cooking; Jolie visits Rafah crossing
description: The shaky 12-week-old ceasefire between Israel and the Hamas militant group has largely ended large-scale Israeli bombardment of Gaza

title: 11 killed as bus crashes head-on into truck in southern Brazil
SC to courts: Impose timelines in probes only if there's delay
description: The Supreme Court has ruled that courts should generally avoid setting deadlines for investigations, as this infringes on the agency's autonomy. Timelines are only to be imposed reactively when there's clear evidence of unjustified delay or stagnation, ensuring a balance between prompt justice and the complexities of probes.

title: Police ask X to remove video of assault on migrant worker
description: The incident occurred on December 26 near the railway quarters in Tiruttani, where 4 juveniles attacked the man from Odisha with a weapon. They recorded the act and uploaded it online

title: NIA shifts a Delhi blast accused to Kashmir, scans forest area in Shopian
description: Multiple teams of the NIA reached Padpawan area of Shopian district along with Yasir Dar, the ninth accused in the case. Officials said a forest area was scanned based on the questioning of the accused

title: Now, Pakistan backs China's claim that it mediated during Op Sindoor
description: Pakistan has now endorsed China's claim of mediating the May 2025 India-Pakistan conflict, a move that raises eyebrows given India's stance.  Islamabad's foreign office spokesperson stated Chinese leaders were in contact with both nations, contributing to de-escalation. This assertion contrasts with India's position that the conflict pause followed a request from Pakistan's DGMO, not third-party intervention.

title: Nigeria police charge Joshua driver with dangerous driving over fatal collision
description: Joshua sustained minor injuries when the Lexus ‍SUV he was travelling in collided with another car on Monday

title: Chelsea’s interim coach says players ’really focused’ on Man City after Maresca exit
description: The London club announced on Thursday that Maresca left his position as manager — following a reported deterioration in his relationship with the team’s hierarchy

title: Indore water deaths: BJP corporator had raised red flag; files did not move
description: Deaths in Indore's water contamination tragedy could have been avoided if warnings from a BJP corporator two years ago were heeded. Corporator Kamal Waghela had repeatedly alerted the Indore Municipal Corporation about old, worn-out pipelines in Bhagirathpura, alleging officials delayed necessary replacements.

title: Indore water contamination: 200 still hospitalised, 32 in ICUs
description: Madhya Pradesh government took action following a contaminated water tragedy in Indore, removing municipal commissioner Dilip Kumar Yadav and suspending additional commissioner Rohit Sisoniya. The move comes as the death toll from the outbreak rose to 10. An in-charge superintendent engineer was also removed, with new officials appointed.

title: Aviation sector to take wings in A.P. as Bhogapuram airport all set for flight validation test on January 4
description: The project undertaken during the NDA’s tenure between 2014 and 2019 after the State bifurcation is expected to be ready by June 30

title: Rabada to lead strong South Africa pace attack at T20 World Cup
description: Kagiso Rabada leads South Africa’s pace attack for the the T20 World Cup in February in India and Sri Lanka

title: Distribution of pattadar passbooks with State Emblem begins in A.P.
description: Naidu, who is abroad, reviews the exercise through teleconference; 22 lakh passbooks will be distributed in villages where re-survey has been completed

title: Civic polls: high drama as BJP workers lock candidate inside his house in Nagpur
description: Dissent among the BJP rank and file was reported from various parts of the State

title: Neeraj, Sachin in AIU's Registered Testing Pool for 1st quarter of 2026
description: While two-time Olympic medal-winning Chopra has been a regular on this list, Yadav is a new entrant after his fourth-place finish in the World Championships last year

title: Punjab police suspect ISI hand in Himachal Pradesh blast
description: Punjab police suspect Pakistan's ISI orchestrated Thursday's explosion in Nalagarh, Himachal Pradesh, to destabilize the region. While Babbar Khalsa International and Punjab Sovereignty Alliance claimed responsibility, police dismissed their ideological claims, stating these groups act on ISI's behalf.

title: Demoralised Bangladesh police appreciated by Tarique Rahman for handling massive events
description: After the fall of the government of Sheikh Hasina, who was recognised for her “zero tolerance of terror” policy, the Bangladesh police continued to be handicapped because of the lingering stain of the crackdown

title: Natural disasters taking heavy toll on Himachal, says report; experts seek policy changes
description: The Himachal Pradesh Human Development Report 2025 said that as Himachal continues to grapple with shifting weather patterns and an increasing number of natural disasters, the economic losses have been high and the human toll substantial

title: Nagpur parents go to work, chain 12-yr-old 'habitual thief' at home
description: A 12-year-old boy in Nagpur was rescued after being chained and locked by his parents for hours daily over two months due to alleged cellphone theft. The school dropout, showing injuries from restraints and signs of trauma, has been moved to a government home for children. Police are investigating the incident.

title: Haryana BJP government extends Lado Lakshmi Yojana to more women with riders, Opposition cries foul
description: Congress’ Sirsa MP Kumari Selja has condemned the new sets of conditions

title: Zach Bryan marries Samantha Leonard; country singer confirms wedding with Instagram post
description: The irreverent country star Zach Bryan has tied the knot. The 29-year-old singer confirmed his marriage to Samantha Leonard, 28, with a low-key Instagram post that stayed true to his stripped-down public persona. Bryan shared the news on Thursday, posting a photo of himself holding Leonard close.

title: Govt directs X to remove all obscene, unlawful content; lens on AI app Grok
description: The Indian government has ordered social media platform X to immediately remove all obscene, sexually explicit, and unlawful content, particularly that generated by its AI app Grok. The Ministry of Electronics and IT issued a notice citing failure to comply with IT Act rules and demanding an action report within 72 hours, warning of legal consequences for non-compliance.

title: Nitish Kumar seeks union government help for better upkeep of Kumhrar Park maintained by ASI
description: He gave the instruction during the inspection of the park and the historical site located in Patna. The Chief Minister also viewed the remains of pillars from the Magadha Empire period preserved in the Kumhrar Park complex.

title: Abhishek Banerjee presents 3 'dead' voters at TMC rally; takes on EC, BJP
description: Trinamool Congress's Abhishek Banerjee launched the party's 2026 election campaign by highlighting alleged voter roll discrepancies. He presented individuals marked as deceased, accusing the Election Commission of targeting Bengalis and questioning the deletion of Bangladeshi names. Banerjee criticized the BJP for issuing notices to common people for SIR hearings, drawing parallels to demonetization.

title: Delhi hikes EWS income cap for healthcare 2X; revised norms notified by DGHS
description: Delhi's government has significantly boosted free healthcare access for low-income families by raising the annual income ceiling for EWS patients to Rs 5 lakh, up from Rs 2.20 lakh. This move, aligning with school admission criteria, will allow more poor individuals to receive free treatment in identified private hospitals across the capital.

title: Earthquake with preliminary magnitude of 6.5 rattles southern, central Mexico
description: The earthquake had a preliminary magnitude of 6.5 and its epicentre was near the town of San Marcos in the southern state of Guerrero near the Pacific coast resort of Acapulco

title: EOW of Odisha police arrest financial fraudster accused of swindling ₹120 crore
description: Arrested from Bankura district of West Bengal, the accused Amit Mandal had collected deposits from 600 gullible investors

title: ‘I will do jihad soon’: How Christian Sturdivant planned New Year’s Eve 'terrorist attack'
description: In a shocking turn of events, North Carolina's own 18-year-old Christian Sturdivant was apprehended just before the clock struck midnight on New Year's Eve. Investigators are alleging that he orchestrated a chilling plot, inspired by ISIS, targeting a local grocery store.

title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing vs Hornets tonight? Latest Jan 2 update
description: Milwaukee Bucks star Giannis Antetokounmpo is probable for tonight's game against the Charlotte Hornets. His presence is crucial as the Hornets face significant frontcourt injuries. If Giannis plays, the Bucks are heavily favored to control the game. The team is managing his calf injury carefully. Other key Bucks players are available.

title: Police register FIR over ‘fake’ claim of teachers being told to count dogs

Resolution on phansi-ghar to be moved in Assembly
Construction ban, vehicle curbs lifted as air quality improves
Delhi air pollution: City wriggles out of GRAP-III grip; yellow alert issued for dense fog
description: Delhi's air quality improved significantly on Friday, leading to the revocation of GRAP stage-III restrictions. Overnight winds helped clear pollutants, though the AQI is expected to turn very poor again from Sunday. The Municipal Corporation of Delhi also intensified its anti-pollution drive, issuing thousands of challans and sealing illegal units.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls the pain after learning of Kobe and Gianna’s tragic deaths
description: It will soon be six years since Kobe Bryant and his teenage daughter, Gianna Bryant, passed away in a horrific healicopter crash in 2020. While Vanessa Bryant has remained strong even in such circumstances, she has opened up about the pain she felt when she heard about the crash and what happened to her husband and her teenage daughter in 2020.

title: VAO ends life after family opposes relationship
Man arrested in POCSO dies due to heart-attack
Armstrong murder accused clash in central prison, assistant jailer injured
Programme to focus on benefits of fermented rice

Man dies after being allegedly beaten by woman in Pulianthope
Reduce number of shops on Marina Beach, HC tells Corporation
description: Justices R. Suresh Kumar and A.D. Jagadish Chandira suggest that only eatables, toys & souvenirs should be sold in the beach

title: Working group to prepare Vision Document 2030 for social welfare
Tamil culture crucial part of India’s broader cultural identity: Vice President
Letters to The Editor — January 3, 2026
First Day First Show | ‘Demon Slayer’ review, Anuparna Roy interview
description: The Hindu’s First Day First Show newsletter brings you news and reviews from the world of cinema and streaming

title: ​Unenviable choice: On the government’s fiscal policy space
description: Growth-generating capital expenditure can affect fiscal targets

title: Who is Christian Sturdivant? FBI arrests ISIS-inspired teen before 'potential terror attack'
Transforming a waste-ridden urban India
description: India needs to move away from a linear to circular mode of waste management, minimising waste and also recovering energy and other resources

title: After VPN ban in Kashmir, J&K Police acts against over 100 users
description: Jammu and Kashmir Police have initiated action against over 100 individuals, including teenagers, for violating prohibitory orders on VPN usage. While no terror links were found, security proceedings were initiated as a preventive measure, with warnings issued to refrain from future violations. The ban was imposed citing national security threats and potential misuse to incite unrest.

title: Safe destination project on the cards for Pathankayam falls in Kozhikode
Property of 7 people accused in UAPA attached in Kathua
description: Kathua Police in Jammu have attached land worth crores belonging to seven individuals residing in Pakistan. Cases under the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act and EIMCO Act have been registered against them. This action underscores the police's commitment to combating unlawful and anti-national activities.

title: Pulwama cricketer wears helmet with Palestinian flag sticker; cops start probe
description: A cricketer's use of a Palestinian flag sticker on his helmet at a Jammu tournament sparked a police probe and political debate. While some condemned it as promoting separatism, others defended it as solidarity, questioning selective outrage. The JKCA disassociated itself from the private event, leaving authorities to investigate the incident's intent and implications.

title: Dangerous turn: On Russia, Ukraine, escalating attacks
description: Moscow and Kyiv must step back from escalation and push for peace

title: Recasting sanitation with urban-rural partnerships
description: The model in Satara district in Maharashtra is an innovative experiment

title: T.N. dominates third tranche of ECMS in jobs, investments
Badshah becomes first Indian to own ultra rare Rolex ‘Barbie’ Daytona — one of the 10 pieces available worldwide
Hockey India League: Soorma HC remain goalless, winless as Ranchi Royals prevail 2-0 with goals from Rutuja, Sakshi
New clues point to ancient comet explosion resulting in extinction of mammoths
Women’s cricket is evolving fast, reckons Rumesh  Ratnayake
'Bihari girls available for marriage for Rs 25k': U'khand minister's husband sparks row
description: An inflammatory claim made by Rekha Arya's husband, a minister from Uttarakhand, has sparked a firestorm of criticism. His insinuation that Bihari girls can be wed off cheaply has drawn sharp rebukes from political factions in Bihar, including allies in the ruling NDA.

title: Hockey India League returns: From Harmanpreet Singh’s backup to India’s goalkeeper depth, five things to look forward to
India’s deep dive into the frozen frontier
description: A team of scientists, including one from Hyderabad-based INCOIS, has successfully deployed and retrieved an autonomous ocean glider in the Southern Ocean, marking a big leap in the country’s polar and deep-ocean research capabilities

title: Two staffers injured in blast at old-age home
description: All 41 residents of the old-age home, aged above 70, were safely evacuated

title: Historic bell set to ring again at 172-year-old church in Secunderabad
description: Restoration of 80-foot bell tower using traditional lime-and-mortar techniques nears completion; tower commemorates missionary Lillian Burgess, who perished in a 19th-century shipwreck while bringing a bell for the church

title: FBI says it disrupted a potential New Year’s Eve attack inspired by Islamic State group
description: Christian Sturdivant, 18, was charged with attempting to provide material support to a foreign terror organization after officials say he communicated his attack plans to an undercover FBI employee

title: Close call: Plane with 55 onboard skids off runway in Nepal; video shows damaged aircraft
description: A Buddha Air aircraft overshot the runway while landing at Nepal's Bhadrapur Airport on Friday night, with all 51 passengers and four crew members escaping uninjured. The plane skidded off the airstrip by nearly 200 meters, coming to a halt in a grassy area with minor damage. A technical team has been dispatched to assess the aircraft.

title: The world is huge, right? It’s not just a chessboard and pieces: Hou Yifan
description: As a child prodigy, a dominant World champion and a university professor, Hou has lived many lives — and she is just 31. Still the top-ranked woman, she intends to study neuroscience to understand the connection between the brain and chess patterns. She opens up in this conversation about her unique relationship with the game

title: Migrant worker falls to death at Technopark
Row over nod for New Year event at convention centre
Kaun Banega Crorepati 17: Host Amitabh Bachchan gets emotional as the season ends
description: The final episode of Kaun Banega Crorepati season 17 saw host Amitabh Bachchan get emotional, reflecting on his long association with the show. To lift spirits, he delivered an impromptu 32-minute singing performance, featuring his popular songs and folk tunes, turning the finale into a grand celebration.

title: Theyyam to light up Thiruvananthapuram during Assembly book festival
description: Fourth edition of the Kerala Legislative Assembly International Book Festival will be organised from January 7 to 13

title: Government to help teachers use AI; will ease open schooling framework
description: Education Ministry hopes Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhishthan Bill will pass during Budget Session; wants to create pathways for non-school institutes, such as ITIs, to offer open schooling programmes under NIOS

title: Xabi Alonso’s pivotal week in the Real Madrid hot seat
description: Managerial life in the Spanish capital can be challenging when the results dry up, as Alonso is discovering. Despite a promising beginning, a form slump has led to the 44-year-old dealing with boardroom drama, superstar egos and fickle fan sentiment. Given club president Florentino Perez’s impatience with managers, Alonso’s future hinges on how his side starts the new year

title: 'Know where to aim': Iran warns Trump over threat; violent protests rock Tehran
description: Iran's foreign minister has firmly rejected US President Trump's warning over protests, calling it reckless interference. He stated demonstrations were driven by economic woes and largely peaceful, with authorities addressing isolated violent incidents. Iran's armed forces are on standby, vowing to forcefully reject any external involvement in their internal affairs.

title: Satheesan promises to help child receive prosthetic arm
‘Perfect health’: Donald Trump says he ‘aced’ third cognitive test
New 153-acre lung space proposed for Bengaluru  in the name of Basavanna
Health scheme for ex-servicemen facing crisis due to govt. apathy, says Congress
description: Congress says the Centre has reduced budget allocations for the medical scheme benefitting ex-servicemen; the party will start an agitation if the government does not release funds by January 30

title: Cabinet approves 1,000-bed multi-speciality hospital in Bengaluru for free organ transplant for poor
Supreme Court condemns denial of bail to give accused a ‘taste of imprisonment as a lesson’
description: Even if allegations are serious, every undertrial should be presumed innocent, court tells enforcement agencies

SHRC seeks immediate relief for families evicted from Kogilu Layout
Cartoonist P.S. Sukumaran dies
200 mobile phones worth Rs 39 lakh returned to its owners in Adilabad

description: The two girls did not speak about the incident for four days as the two accused had threatened them with dire consequences; the incident came to light when one of them needed medical attention after complaining of pain

title: BYD surpasses Tesla as world’s biggest electric vehicle maker
Chandigarh farmers’ hopes revived as Kataria endorses land pooling model
Two terror outfits claim responsibility for Nalagarh blast
‘Abhishek following Rahul’: Cong, TMC spar over credit for exposing ‘vote chori’
description: Trinamool's Abhishek Banerjee accused Congress and other parties of misunderstanding the "vote chori" issue, claiming it happens through electoral rolls, not EVMs. He stressed ground-level booth fights over social media campaigns. Congress leader Adhir Chowdhury sharply retorted, accusing Banerjee of copying Rahul Gandhi's agenda and questioning his anti-BJP silence.

title: Charlie Kirk killing video sparks questions as Brian Harpole footage spreads
description: A new video showing Brian Harpole before Charlie Kirk’s shooting has sparked strong online debate. Some viewers call his actions suspicious, while others see nothing wrong. Candace Owens has raised questions but shared no proof. Police say Tyler Robinson is the only suspect, and no official finding links Harpole to the killing.

title: Indore water contamination: CM Mohan Yadav takes action; civic officials suspended
description: Madhya Pradesh chief minister Mohan Yadav announced strict action against senior civic officials following a contaminated drinking water incident in Indore's Bhagirathpura, which affected over 1,400 people and led to confirmed deaths. Two officials were suspended, and the municipal commissioner was ordered to be removed due to negligence.

description: Team of senior doctors will analyse media reports of deaths related to drinking water contamination and update official figures, says Collector; two senior municipal corporation officials suspended as Congress seeks accountability and action

description: SMA is a rare neuromuscular disorder characterised by the degeneration of motor neurons, leading to progressive muscle weakness and wasting

title: 12-year-old chained, locked by parents rescued
Watch: Earthquake hits during Mexican President’s address - Here’s what happens next
description: A powerful 6.5 magnitude earthquake struck southern Mexico on Friday morning, disrupting President Claudia Sheinbaum's press briefing and prompting a swift evacuation of the National Palace. The tremor was felt across Mexico City and surrounding regions, but authorities reported no immediate major damage or casualties. Early warning systems proved crucial in alerting residents to the seismic event.

title: CEC member visits Bannerghatta National Park, interacts with farmers
description: The petition argued that the notification regarding the reduction of the ESZ has excluded ecologically critical areas surrounding established elephant corridors

title: Tourist access to Kashmir’s Margan Top, Chauhar Nag, Sinthan Top banned over security
description: According to an order issued by the SDM, Kokernag, inputs from police and security agencies indicated security vulnerabilities in certain high-altitude and forested areas

title: Yemen’s Saudi-backed government launches operation against UAE-backed STC in Hadramout Province
US travel ban on 39 countries comes into effect; check full list here
description: As of January 1, 2026, a new US travel ban officially took effect, impacting citizens from 39 countries. The expanded restrictions, issued by the Trump administration, impose full or partial entry bans for both immigrants and nonimmigrants. This policy aims to prevent the entry of individuals from countries where the US lacks sufficient information to assess risks.

Elon Musk's father Errol Musk says 'America will collapse if …'
description: Errol Musk, father of Tesla CEO Elon Musk, has sparked controversy with remarks predicting a US 'collapse' due to the white population becoming a minority within two decades. He also downplayed systemic oppression in South Africa, claiming white populations significantly contributed to Black African development.

title: Brittany Mahomes shares New Year glimpse as Patrick Mahomes grinds through rehab
description: Patrick Mahomes is entering 2026 focused entirely on rehab after suffering ACL and LCL tears late in the season. A New Year post from Brittany Mahomes confirmed he is still on crutches, reinforcing the long road ahead. Andy Reid stressed patience, noting Mahomes remains around the team while prioritizing recovery over travel or timelines.

title: York family net worth: How a $13 million bet became the 49ers’ $8.4 billion empire
description: Forbes ranks San Francisco 49ers owner Denise DeBartolo York and her family at $8.4 Billion, placing them ahead of Donald Trump and Mark Cuban. The York family controls over 90% of the 49ers, now valued above $8 Billion, after decades of growth tied to NFL success and global sports investments, according to Forbes 2025 rankings released in September this year.

title: Paulina Gretzky net worth 2025: Inside Wayne Gretzky’s daughter’s wealth
description: The daughter of a legendary hockey player, Wayne Gretzky, and a wife to a pro golf player, Dustin Johnson, Paulina Gretzky has established her own way in the industry of entertainment and social media. Having a net worth of five million dollars, she has been successful in business, modeling, and acting. It has also been reported that she will inherit a large portion of her father's fortune.

title: Tesla's former AI boss: Google Waymo cannot match Tesla's self-driving tech; explains why
description: Former Tesla AI chief Andrej Karpathy believes Google's Waymo couldn't replicate Tesla's recent coast-to-coast autonomous drive. He highlighted Tesla's end-to-end neural network versus Waymo's modular system, which struggled during a San Francisco power outage. Karpathy praised the milestone despite recent criticism from Elon Musk about his "dated" views.

title: Vitamin B12 in eggs: How to cook eggs right to get maximum vitamins
description: Eggs are a natural source of vitamin B12, crucial for nerve function and energy. Researchers found cooking methods affect nutrient availability. Gentle cooking like soft boiling, poaching, low-heat frying, and steaming best preserves vitamin B12. Overcooking, especially the yolk, diminishes its nutritional value. Simple adjustments in heat and time can maximize the benefits of this everyday food.
